name: Monogrammed Beach-y Wooden Fish, Lake House Decor, Family Name, YOU CHOOSE COLORS
description:
*This listing is priced per EACH fish, select how many from the drop down*

These beach-y fish are cute individually with a simple initial or spell out Jr's name in the nursery or the family's name by the front door. Each fish measures approx. 7 3/4" wide x 5 1/2" tall (plus the twine hanger) and will be from 3/8" to 1/2" thick being made from up cycled pine wood. The set shown was a custom order finished in sea glass, country sky blue and navy stenciled lettering.  You can check out the color chart on Glidden.com for custom colors and also check out my shop for other beach-y, primitive decor items.  Be sure to mention your color choice(s), name or initial's in the note to seller at checkout. Or feel free to contact me with any questions! **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

name: RESERVED LISTING FOR MERRIL
description:
This is a reserved listing for Merril.  Please allow 14 days to make and ship. Thank you!!

4 large sea horses 

2 sets of turtles (10)

1 set of angel fish (6)

1 set of beach-y fish (6)

12 baby sea horses

name: School Of 6 Beach-y Wooden Fish, Lake House Decor, **You Choose Colors**
description: I create this school of 6 whimsical fish from up cycled furniture wood or plywood remnants. The set shown has been layered with white and bright beach-y Glidden colors of watermelon smoothie, Bermuda bay, country sky blue, spring green, tropical surf and sea glass. The finish is heavily distressed then lightly sealed. Each fish is given a simple twine hanger and measures 4 1/2" tall x 7". You can check out the color chart on Glidden.com for custom colors and also check out my shop for other beach-y, primitive decor items. **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

name: Wall Mounted King Size Headboard, Window Cornice Or Primitive Display Shelf
description: Custom king size headboard or window cornice, complete with shelf across the top and 5 rustic shadow boxes or cubbies for added interest and display. The piece shown was a custom order as a headboard and done in "Bermuda Bay" layered with black for a heavily distressed look. Standard backing I use for the cubbies is bead board. (which can be seen in my other headboard listings) At the customers request a smoother wood was used on this order so wall paper could be added. Made from pine, they can be done in any color.  Please check out the color chart at Glidden.com for many more color options. Measures 13 1/4" high and comes out 5 1/2" from the wall and is 76" wide. Smaller lengths available, just contact me with the length you need for a quote, and also your shipping address....shipping charges can vary greatly depending on the size you order and where you live. Mounting hardware is included. **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**  Shipping quote is for the west coast, your cost may be less.  Feel free to contact me with your zip code for a more exact price.

name: King Size Headboard, Wall Mount, Rustic Display Shelf And Cubbies, **You Choose Colors**
description: The newest size and design in my headboard category. This King size headboard was a custom request and measures 30" tall x 76" wide and 5 1/2" deep on the top shelf. 3 shallow cubbies for a little extra display space and design interest. The piece shown was done in an oyster shell base with muted distressing in warm caramel with a moderate amount of distressing done to the finish so the layers show through. These are made-to-order and the color combinations are endless, just go to Glidden.com to find the perfect match to your decor. Mounting hardware is included. **PLEASE ALLOW 14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

name: 5 Beach-y Sea Turtles, Coastal Living, Nautical Wall Decor **You Choose Colors**
description: I create this set of 5 whimsical sea turtles from up cycled furniture wood, plywood or siding remnants. The set shown is finished in sea glass and olive green, then layered with white, distressed and sealed. Each turtle has 2 holes drilled in the back for hanging in either direction and measures 9 1/4" x 7 1/2". Feel free to contact me for custom colors **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP.**

name: Entry Or Sofa Table, Plant Stand, Rustic Wooden Bench, Country Cottage Decor **You Choose Color**
description: Large wooden entry table or pant stand can also be used as a bench that coordinates with the style of my headboards. The piece shown was a custom order and is 24" high. The finish shown was finished in Bermuda bay, black and fresh baked pumpernickel for a highly distressed look.  You can also go to Glidden.com and check out their color chart for many more color options to match your own style! Measures 76" wide x 24" tall and has a 11 1/4" wide seat, the legs are shipped disassembled and are easy to attach with 4 screws on each side (included) and wooden plugs to cover the screw holes. Contact me for other sizes and check back in my furniture section as I am working on more bench and table designs. The shipping quote is for the west coast, you cost may be less. Feel free to contact me with your zip for a more accurate quote or combined shipping. **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

name: Twin Headboard, Rustic Bookcase, Sofa Table, Entry Console, Display Shelf, **You Choose Color**
description: Originally custom designed as a twin headboard, this rustic piece has multiple uses. Built in bookcase with display shelf would make a very functional sofa table or entry console to hold a little lamp, art, your favorite books or keys. Measures 33" high x 41" wide. The bookcase is 7 1/2" deep x 38 1/2" wide and starts 24" up from the bottom, which is where the top of an average twin mattress comes up to. If you are using this as a headboard please double check your mattress height. The top shelf comes out 9 1/4" from the wall. The finish on this was done in BEHR Aspen Aura with a black antiquing glaze applied, you can also go to Glidden.com and check out their color chart for hundreds of other options.  The shipping quote is for the west coast, your cost may be less. Feel free to contact me with your zip code to check the cost to your area. **PLEASE ALLOW 14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

name: 50 Beach Themed Decorative Wooden Tags, Gift Tags, Sea Turtles, Star Fish
description: Lots of uses for this beach-y set of tags! This listing is for 50 tags, each comes with a twine hanger to add a touch of coastal living to your gifts, home, wedding or nautical themed Christmas tree. Made from 3/8" pine,they are finished on both sides and have been given a weathered and distressed look. They range from 3 1/2' - 4 3/4" in size. Colors shown are olive, pale green, white and Bermuda Bay. If you prefer them all one color or something different, just contact me to discuss. :) *Sea shells are for display only and not included**PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

name: 4 Piece Wooden Sea Weed, Sea Shore Wall Decor, Natural Nautical Background
description: Decorative wooden sea weed to accent your beach-y or coastal decor. Finished in shades of blues and greens then heavily distressed to show the painted layers. Height is 13" with an approx. width of 22" when laid out with each piece touching. Would make a nice accent with some of my wooden fish or turtle pieces. Color can be changed to match your decor, just mention your preference at checkout. You will receive sea weed similar to what is shown, each order will be slightly different and unique! There will be a few nail holes drilled in the back to hang on the wall. If you would prefer the pieces to be finished on both sides with no nail holes, please specify at checkout. Shells and stones are for display only and not included. **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

name: Rustic, Cottage Style Display Shelf, Towel Bar Or Coat Rack, MADE TO ORDER You Choose Color
description:
Custom made combination display shelf, coat or towel rack and funky wall art all in one! This piece has been designed to look like a coffee table and given a highly distressed and worn finish, layering black, cream and mustard yellow paint.  Go to Glidden.com and check out their color chart for many more options. A nice piece with a primitive farmhouse look...a conversation piece in any room! Measures 36" wide x 15 1/2" high and the shelf top comes out 5 1/2" from the wall. Legs unscrew for the option of a different look and will be shipped with them disassembled to hold down shipping costs, they easily screw back on. Mounting hardware is included. **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

Glidden Color Chart:

name: Set Of 2 Large Wooden Seahorse's, Whimsical Wall Hangings, Beach House Decor, YOU CHOOSE COLORS
description:
Wooden seahorse wall hangings for your beach-y style home or a cute and whimsical addition for a nursery wall. The piece's shown were finished in bermuda bay and watermelon smoothie layered over white and heavily distressed, then lightly sealed. You can also go to "Glidden.com" and choose from hundreds of options on their color chart.  A starfish has also hitched a ride on their tail! Measures 9 1/2" wide x 22" tall and has a hook on the back for hanging. **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP**

Glidden.com

name: School Of 6 Angel Fish, Beach House Style, Coastal Decor, YOU CHOOSE COLORS
description:
I create this school of 6 whimsical fish from up cycled furniture wood, plywood or siding remnants. The set shown has been layered with white and bright beach-y colors of Tangerine, Daffodil, true turquoise, peacock blue, spring green and sea glass. The finish is heavily distressed then lightly sealed. Each fish is given a simple twine hanger on the back and measures 7" x 9". Contact me for custom colors and also check out my shop for other beach-y and coastal decor items. **PLEASE ALLOW 10-14 DAYS TO MAKE AND SHIP.**
